title: Pregnant Lucy Mecklenburgh devastated as she's forced to leave Ryan Thomas for a month

Lucy Mecklenburgh has revealed her sorrow at having to spend the next month without fiance Ryan Thomas .

The pregnant former TOWIE star will be left home alone while Ryan jets off on holiday with his brothers Adam and Scott Thomas, along with their dad.

Taking to her Instagram , Lucy laughed as she filmed Ryan running alongside her train as it pulled out of the station.

He waved frantically at her as she wrote over the sweet clip: "A month apart. Ganna miss this crazy man! @ryanthomas84."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The 28-year-old mum to be was making her way to London for a fashion event with Pronovias while Ryan did some last-minute packing before heading to the airport.

He, Scott and Adam have since shared videos and pictures of their flight, laughing as they helped themselves to a tray full of champagne offered by an air stewardess.

Meanwhile, Lucy will be focusing on her pregnancy after the happy couple learned they are expecting a baby boy.

The pair revealed their big news on Instagram, both wearing blue outfits in the cute shot, which Ryan captioned: "Blue is for.....?"

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Lucy also shared a heartwarming video of Ryan bursting into tears of joy when they found out about their son.

An overwhelmed Ryan punched the air in flee and hugged his fiancee, while she stared down at the medical notes in shock.

"It's a boy? It's a boy!" cried Ryan.

"I just knew it was that. It's not a surprise to me," said Lucy. "I can't get my head around it. It's so weird."

Ryan then showered Lucy in kisses and screamed out "Oh yes!" repeatedly.

(Image: Instagram)

Since finding out the sex of their new arrival, Lucy and Ryan have been enjoying a babymoon together as they plan for parenthood.

The pair treated themselves to a stay in the luxe Anantara Vilamoura Algarve resort.

Lucy wrote: "Last holiday me & @ryanthomas84 before our bubba arrives! Thank you @reserveahotel for helping me organise our perfect babymoon.

"Portugal was perfect for relaxing by the pool, long walks on the most beautiful beaches, a boat trip to see the dolphins & caves and delicious food!! Different to our normal holiday but just as special (just less vino & dancing!)."
description: Lucy Mecklenburgh, who is expecting her first baby with fiance Ryan Thomas, will be parted from him for the next four weeks
